A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Go watch this movie for yourself. If you understand what Star Wars is really about then you’ll like it. If you think that Star Wars is “yours” and that it should go the way “you” want it to\, you may not like it. It is refreshing\, full of hope and surprises. Oh and if you say you are a die hard Star Wars fan and you even like the prequels then you are only kidding yourself.
